about_me.des: A father & Java Architect & WPO fans & CDN startup company & Full Stack engineer.

projects.cachemoment: Cachemoment is an innovative SaaS platform for accelerating and secure websites.

career.everbridge_desc: About â€‹Everbridge, Our Story of Commitment to Keeping People Safe and Businesses Running.
career.cachemoment_desc: Cachemoment is an innovative SaaS platform for accelerating and secure websites. I am responsible for the architecture and development for all of the service technology as well as the management of the engineering team.
career.yottaaB_desc: I am responsible for release Platform feature, plan the sprint, coordinated Dev Engineer and QA Engineer assignments and communication.
career.yottaaA_desc: Yottaa is the leading SaaS platform for accelerating eCommerce. I am responsible for the architecture of the Yottaa Platform as well as developed the distributed HTTP traffic processing cloud.
career.99bill_desc: 99bill Corporation is the leading independent third-party payment service provider in China. I am responsible for the development of a payment system as well as a Stored Value Card system.
career.51credit_desc: 51credit Corporation is the leading credit card web portal in China. I am responsible for the development of a CMS as well as the credit card portal site and MIS.
